kind.description: The kind of application that this component refers to, used to customize UI. This value is a freeform string, values should typically be one of the following: web, ios, other, store, java, phone.

name.description: The name of the Application Insights component resource.

properties.description: Properties that define an Application Insights component resource.

Id.description: Internally assigned unique id of the item definition.

Name.description: The user-defined name of the item.

Properties.description: A set of properties that can be defined in the context of a specific item type. Each type may have its own properties.

Scope.description: Enum indicating if this item definition is owned by a specific user or is shared between all users with access to the Application Insights component.

Properties.description: Serialized JSON object for detailed properties

CurrentBillingFeatures.description: Current enabled pricing plan. When the component is in the Enterprise plan, this will list both 'Basic' and 'Application Insights Enterprise'.

DataVolumeCap.description: An Application Insights component daily data volume cap

DestinationAccountId.description: The name of destination storage account.

DestinationAddress.description: The SAS URL for the destination storage container. It must grant write permission.

DestinationStorageLocationId.description: The location ID of the destination storage container.

DestinationStorageSubscriptionId.description: The subscription ID of the destination storage container.

DestinationType.description: The Continuous Export destination type. This has to be 'Blob'.

IsEnabled.description: Set to 'true' to create a Continuous Export configuration as enabled, otherwise set it to 'false'.

name.description: The Continuous Export configuration ID. This is unique within a Application Insights component.

RecordTypes.description: The document types to be exported, as comma separated values. Allowed values include 'Requests', 'Event', 'Exceptions', 'Metrics', 'PageViews', 'PageViewPerformance', 'Rdd', 'PerformanceCounters', 'Availability', 'Messages'.

Category.description: Favorite category, as defined by the user at creation time.

Config.description: Configuration of this particular favorite, which are driven by the Azure portal UX. Configuration data is a string containing valid JSON

FavoriteType.description: Enum indicating if this favorite definition is owned by a specific user or is shared between all users with access to the Application Insights component.

IsGeneratedFromTemplate.description: Flag denoting wether or not this favorite was generated from a template.

Name.description: The user-defined name of the favorite.

name.description: The Id of a specific favorite defined in the Application Insights component

SourceType.description: The source of the favorite definition.

Tags.description: A list of 0 or more tags that are associated with this favorite definition

Version.description: This instance's version of the data model. This can change as new features are added that can be marked favorite. Current examples include MetricsExplorer (ME) and Search.

Id.description: Internally assigned unique id of the item definition.

Name.description: The user-defined name of the item.

Properties.description: A set of properties that can be defined in the context of a specific item type. Each type may have its own properties.

Scope.description: Enum indicating if this item definition is owned by a specific user or is shared between all users with access to the Application Insights component.

CustomEmails.description: Custom email addresses for this rule notifications

Enabled.description: A flag that indicates whether this rule is enabled by the user

LastUpdatedTime.description: The last time this rule was updated

name.description: The ProactiveDetection configuration ID. This is unique within a Application Insights component.

RuleDefinitions.description: Static definitions of the ProactiveDetection configuration rule (same values for all components).

SendEmailsToSubscriptionOwners.description: A flag that indicated whether notifications on this rule should be sent to subscription owners

kind.description: The kind of workbook. Choices are user and shared.

name.description: The name of the Application Insights component resource.

properties.description: Properties that contain a private workbook.

kind.description: The kind of web test that this web test watches. Choices are ping and multistep.

name.description: The name of the Application Insights webtest resource.

properties.description: Metadata describing a web test for an Azure resource.

kind.description: The kind of workbook. Choices are user and shared.

name.description: The name of the Application Insights component resource.

functionAlias.description: A function alias, used when the type of the item is Function

ApplicationInsightsComponentAnalyticsIte.description: A set of properties that can be defined in the context of a specific item type. Each type may have its own properties.

Cap.description: Daily data volume cap in GB.

StopSendNotificationWhenHitCap.description: Do not send a notification email when the daily data volume cap is met.

ApplicationInsightsComponentDataVolumeCa.description: An Application Insights component daily data volume cap

DisplayName.description: The rule name as it is displayed in UI

HelpUrl.description: URL which displays additional info about the proactive detection rule

IsEnabledByDefault.description: A flag indicating whether the rule is enabled by default

IsHidden.description: A flag indicating whether the rule is hidden (from the UI)

IsInPreview.description: A flag indicating whether the rule is in preview

SupportsEmailNotifications.description: A flag indicating whether email notifications are supported for detections for this rule

ApplicationInsightsComponentProactiveDet.description: Static definitions of the ProactiveDetection configuration rule (same values for all components).

Flow_Type.description: Used by the Application Insights system to determine what kind of flow this component was created by. This is to be set to 'Bluefield' when creating/updating a component via the REST API.

HockeyAppId.description: The unique application ID created when a new application is added to HockeyApp, used for communications with HockeyApp.

IngestionMode.description: Indicates the flow of the ingestion.

Request_Source.description: Describes what tool created this Application Insights component. Customers using this API should set this to the default 'rest'.

SamplingPercentage.description: Percentage of the data produced by the application being monitored that is being sampled for Application Insights telemetry.

ApplicationInsightsComponentProperties.description: Properties that define an Application Insights component resource.

Id.description: Internally assigned unique id of the item definition.

Name.description: The user-defined name of the item.

Properties.description: A set of properties that can be defined in the context of a specific item type. Each type may have its own properties.

Scope.description: Enum indicating if this item definition is owned by a specific user or is shared between all users with access to the Application Insights component.

Type.description: Enum indicating the type of the Analytics item.

Properties.description: Serialized JSON object for detailed properties

CurrentBillingFeatures.description: Current enabled pricing plan. When the component is in the Enterprise plan, this will list both 'Basic' and 'Application Insights Enterprise'.

DataVolumeCap.description: An Application Insights component daily data volume cap

DestinationAccountId.description: The name of destination storage account.

DestinationAddress.description: The SAS URL for the destination storage container. It must grant write permission.

DestinationStorageLocationId.description: The location ID of the destination storage container.

DestinationStorageSubscriptionId.description: The subscription ID of the destination storage container.

DestinationType.description: The Continuous Export destination type. This has to be 'Blob'.

IsEnabled.description: Set to 'true' to create a Continuous Export configuration as enabled, otherwise set it to 'false'.

name.description: The Continuous Export configuration ID. This is unique within a Application Insights component.

RecordTypes.description: The document types to be exported, as comma separated values. Allowed values include 'Requests', 'Event', 'Exceptions', 'Metrics', 'PageViews', 'PageViewPerformance', 'Rdd', 'PerformanceCounters', 'Availability', 'Messages'.

Category.description: Favorite category, as defined by the user at creation time.

Config.description: Configuration of this particular favorite, which are driven by the Azure portal UX. Configuration data is a string containing valid JSON

FavoriteType.description: Enum indicating if this favorite definition is owned by a specific user or is shared between all users with access to the Application Insights component.

IsGeneratedFromTemplate.description: Flag denoting wether or not this favorite was generated from a template.

Name.description: The user-defined name of the favorite.

name.description: The Id of a specific favorite defined in the Application Insights component

SourceType.description: The source of the favorite definition.

Tags.description: A list of 0 or more tags that are associated with this favorite definition

Version.description: This instance's version of the data model. This can change as new features are added that can be marked favorite. Current examples include MetricsExplorer (ME) and Search.

Id.description: Internally assigned unique id of the item definition.

Name.description: The user-defined name of the item.

Properties.description: A set of properties that can be defined in the context of a specific item type. Each type may have its own properties.

Scope.description: Enum indicating if this item definition is owned by a specific user or is shared between all users with access to the Application Insights component.

Type.description: Enum indicating the type of the Analytics item.

CustomEmails.description: Custom email addresses for this rule notifications

Enabled.description: A flag that indicates whether this rule is enabled by the user

LastUpdatedTime.description: The last time this rule was updated

name.description: The ProactiveDetection configuration ID. This is unique within a Application Insights component.

RuleDefinitions.description: Static definitions of the ProactiveDetection configuration rule (same values for all components).

SendEmailsToSubscriptionOwners.description: A flag that indicated whether notifications on this rule should be sent to subscription owners

category.description: Workbook category, as defined by the user at creation time.

displayName.description: The user-defined name of the private workbook.

serializedData.description: Configuration of this particular private workbook. Configuration data is a string containing valid JSON

sourceId.description: Optional resourceId for a source resource.

tags.description: A list of 0 or more tags that are associated with this private workbook definition

version.description: This instance's version of the data model. This can change as new features are added that can be marked private workbook.

MyWorkbookProperties.description: Properties that contain a private workbook.

Id.description: Location ID for the webtest to run from.

WebTestGeolocation.description: Geo-physical location to run a web test from. You must specify one or more locations for the test to run from.

Configuration.description: An XML configuration specification for a WebTest.

Description.description: Purpose/user defined descriptive test for this WebTest.

Enabled.description: Is the test actively being monitored.

Frequency.description: Interval in seconds between test runs for this WebTest. Default value is 300.

Kind.description: The kind of web test this is, valid choices are ping and multistep.

Locations.description: A list of where to physically run the tests from to give global coverage for accessibility of your application.

Name.description: User defined name if this WebTest.

RetryEnabled.description: Allow for retries should this WebTest fail.

SyntheticMonitorId.description: Unique ID of this WebTest. This is typically the same value as the Name field.

Timeout.description: Seconds until this WebTest will timeout and fail. Default value is 30.

WebTestProperties.description: Metadata describing a web test for an Azure resource.

WebTest.description: The XML specification of a WebTest to run against an application.

WebTestPropertiesConfiguration.description: An XML configuration specification for a WebTest.

category.description: Workbook category, as defined by the user at creation time.

kind.description: Enum indicating if this workbook definition is owned by a specific user or is shared between all users with access to the Application Insights component.

name.description: The user-defined name of the workbook.

serializedData.description: Configuration of this particular workbook. Configuration data is a string containing valid JSON

sourceResourceId.description: Optional resourceId for a source resource.

tags.description: A list of 0 or more tags that are associated with this workbook definition

userId.description: Unique user id of the specific user that owns this workbook.

version.description: This instance's version of the data model. This can change as new features are added that can be marked workbook.

workbookId.description: Internally assigned unique id of the workbook definition.
